name: Wallker Demolition Co.
description:
If the HTML5 doesn't work for you, consider downloading the game below! Wallker Demolition Co. A game about exploding buildings while moving in unexpected ways Made for the Gotm.io Jam #1! Controls Function Control Scheme #1 Control Scheme #2 Moving  Arrow keys WASD keys Jumping or walking on wall Z or C K Deploying a bomb X J Pausing Enter or P Enter or P Muting M M Credits and used software

This game uses the following pre-made assets:

  • Pixel Frog: Sprites and tileset from Pirate Bomb and Kings and Pigs;
  • HelpTheWretched (HTW):  Some samples used as sound effects;
  • Kevin MacLeod: "Danger Storm", the game's background music, according to the attribution:
    • Danger Storm by Kevin MacLeod
      Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4985-danger-storm
      License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license

The rest of the game was possible to be made by using the following software:

  • Godot Engine 3.2.2;
  • Aseprite 1.2.25;
  • Audacity 2.4.1;
  • Jxfr.

And the team was:

  • Delta-key: Coding, level design;
  • Sucraiso: Play testing, some sprite edits, feedback.
